title: "spatial tidy census"
format: html
editor: visual

```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE)

orange <- get_acs(
  state = "CA",
  county = "Orange",
  geography = "tract",
  variables = "B19013_001",
  geometry = TRUE,
  year = 2020
)

head(orange)
```

```{r}
orange %>%
  ggplot(aes(fill = estimate)) + 
  geom_sf(color = NA) + 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "magma") 
```
